lines.text: You didn't believe her, and you still don't?

At first I didn't believe her. But then last night Ron Cooper came to me and asked me to lie for him. He asked me to say that Lyn had a crush on him and was making it up. Thats when I knew she was telling the truth all along. And that Ron Cooper is the scum of the earth.
Oh, I get it, I had more Barbie dolls than you, so you had to steal my boyfriend?
The thought of him going through his life like nothing ever happened... makes me sick to my stomach

I've had it with you, that's why! When I think of all that I have done for you, what my family has done for you - you spent more time at my house then you did your own, now I know why! You probably thought your own family was too low class for you!
He took something from me! No one seems to understand that but it's true. A lot of things will never be the same for me again.
Nothing? You look like you just came from an exorcism!
He told me you were gonna be there - we were all gone have coffee! I hadn't seen you, I didn't know that you were sick! Next thing I knew he was all over me.
Oh, and you just couldn't get away?
Ron Cooper forced you to have sex with him?
*No*! Of course I don't believe you! Why would Ron Cooper have to rape anybody? He could have any girl in this campus with a flick of his eyebrow!
Except me - he had to force me.
*Look* - you're not finished with me, you bastard! You can't get away with this - I'm not gonna let you get away with this. I'm gonna make you pay!
